plot: Four friends go back to their alma mater for a wedding photo shoot, when memories of a horrific past, beats back on them through hallucinations and whispers from beyond the reality.
title: Silent Sins
plot_es: Four friends go back to their alma mater for a wedding photo shoot, when memories of a horrific past, beats back on them through hallucinations and whispers from beyond the reality.
plot_en: Four friends go back to their alma mater for a wedding photo shoot, when memories of a horrific past, beats back on them through hallucinations and whispers from beyond the reality.
